txt.en: 'Upon the western shores of the Ice Bay, where the storms often rage the worst, dwell fell spirits sent from Angmar to trouble the Lossoth. The demons raise up terrible wights and make of it a place of great dread. Go forth and banish these creatures from the shores of Forochel.\n\n'You will find them above this cave, south and west from its mouth and then north into the ruins. When you have fulfilled your task, return to me here.'
'Your task was futile, for a mortal cannot eternally banish a spirit, but your courage in the face of such horror speaks well of you.'

'Upon the western shores of the Ice Bay, where the storms often rage the worst, dwell fell spirits sent from Angmar to trouble the Lossoth. The demons raise up terrible wights and make of it a place of great dread. Go forth and banish these creatures from the shores of Forochel.\n\n'You will find them above this cave, south and west from its mouth and then north into the ruins. When you have fulfilled your task, return to me here.'
'You have faced the horror of the ice-wights... you have courage.'
Saija has two tasks she requires of you before she imparts her knowledge.
Ice-wights can be found above Näky-kolo south and west from Näky-kolo.\n\nSaija has tasked you with banishing the ice-wights from the shores of Forochel.
Saija is at Näky-kolo.\n\nNow that you have defeated many ice-wights, you should return to Saija as instructed.
